Kristian â€œTKâ€ Russell has a diverse background in brand creation, social media, entertainment and interactive product design.

He has created compelling online brands, sites and experiences for corporations and tech companies including Intuit, Sony, Oracle, Nintendo, Netflix, Microsoft and many others, earning him a Webby, a Clio and a recent TED Grant nomination.

He is founder of startups wmbly and Id. – and principal of interactive consulting firm inside interactive and also runs a commercial, TV and Film music placement service, CANDYSHOP.
